name: browserify-debowerify-mocha-phantomjs-example

scripts.test-browser: trap 'kill $serverPid' EXIT; ./node_modules/httpserver/httpserver.js -p 9999 & serverPid=$!; open http://localhost:9999/spec/index.html; wait
